Package org.dspace.handle.dao

Interface HandleDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericDAO<Handle>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HandleDAOImpl
    public interface HandleDAO
extends GenericDAO<Handle>
    Database Access Object interface class for the Handle object. The implementation of this class is responsible for all database calls for the Handle object and is autowired by spring This class should only be accessed from a single service and should never be exposed outside of the API
    Author:
    kevinvandevelde at atmire.com
